org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.admin
Class AeSQLScriptParser

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.admin.AeSQLScriptParser
public class AeSQLScriptParser
extends java.lang.Object

Utility to read in sql script files and return (string) sql statements. NOTE: Sql statements and comments can span multiple lines, but they should not be intertwined. Multiple sql statements should not appear on the same line.
